diff_hunk:
@@ -140,14 +140,15 @@ $(shell mkdir -p $(DEPDIR) >/dev/null)
 # Settings for the target compiler.
 CXX := $(CC_PREFIX) gcc
 OPTFLAGS := -O0
-CXXFLAGS := --std=c++11 -DIS_SLIM_BUILD $(OPTFLAGS)
+CXXFLAGS := --std=c++11 -DIS_SLIM_BUILD -fno-exceptions -DNDEBUG $(OPTFLAGS)
 LDFLAGS := \
 -L/usr/local/lib
 DEPFLAGS = -MT $@ -MMD -MP -MF $(DEPDIR)/$*.Td
 
 INCLUDES := \
 -I. \
 -I$(MAKEFILE_DIR)/downloads/ \
+-I$(MAKEFILE_DIR)/downloads/gemmlowp/ \
body: We actually already download gemmlowp, but this change shouldn't be checked in since it's only necessary when we're running quantized models, so I've removed it.
